name: use_aws
description: Make a boto3 client call with the specified service, operation, and parameters. Boto3 operations are snake_case.

service_name.description: The name of the AWS service

operation_name.description: The name of the operation to perform

region.description: Region name for calling the operation on AWS boto3

label.description: Label of AWS API operations human readable explanation. This is useful for communicating with human.

profile_name.description: Optional: AWS profile name to use from ~/.aws/credentials. Defaults to default profile if not specified.
